name: UIContentSizeCategory
desc: Constants that indicate the preferred size of your content.

items.name: static let unspecified: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: An unspecified font size.

items.name: static let extraSmall: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: An extra-small font.

items.name: static let small: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: A small font.

items.name: static let medium: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: A medium-sized font.

items.name: static let large: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: A large font.

items.name: static let extraLarge: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: An extra-large font.

items.name: static let extraExtraLarge: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: A font that is larger than the extra-large font but smaller than the largest font size available.

items.name: static let extraExtraExtraLarge: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: The largest font size.

items.name: static let accessibilityMedium: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: A medium font size that reflects the current accessibility settings.

items.name: static let accessibilityLarge: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: A large font size that reflects the current accessibility settings.

items.name: static let accessibilityExtraLarge: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: An extra-large font size that reflects the current accessibility settings.

items.name: static let accessibilityExtraExtraLarge: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: A font that is larger than the extra-large font but not the largest available, reflecting the current accessibility settings.

items.name: static let accessibilityExtraExtraExtraLarge: UIContentSizeCategory
items.desc: The largest font size that reflects the current accessibility settings.

items.name: var isAccessibilityCategory: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the content size category is associated with accessibility.

items.name: static let didChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that posts when the user changes the preferred content size setting.

items.name: static let newValueUserInfoKey: String
items.desc: A key that reflects the new preferred content size.

items.name: static func < (UIContentSizeCategory, UIContentSizeCategory) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the left-hand category represents a text size smaller than the text size associated with the right-hand category.

items.name: static func <= (UIContentSizeCategory, UIContentSizeCategory) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the left-hand category represents a text size smaller than or equal to the text size associated with the right-hand category.

items.name: static func > (UIContentSizeCategory, UIContentSizeCategory) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the left-hand category represents a text size greater than the text size associated with the right-hand category.

items.name: static func >= (UIContentSizeCategory, UIContentSizeCategory) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether the left-hand category represents a text size greater than or equal to the text size associated with the right-hand category.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.

items.name: init(ContentSizeCategory?)
items.desc: Creates a content size category from the specified SwiftUI content size category.
